sentence.Network_en: The curve of nutrients uptake by poinsettia was sigmoid.
sentence.Network_cn: 一品红养分吸收曲线呈“S” 型.

sentence.Network_en: The left kidney was multicystic dysplastic. The sigmoid colon was extremely distended.
sentence.Network_cn: 左肾为多囊肾和发育不良,乙状结肠极度扩张.

sentence.Network_en: The ulcerations worsen and the woman eventually underwent a loop sigmoid colostomy.
sentence.Network_cn: 溃疡恶化,最终该女患经受了乙状结肠袢式造口术.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Greek sigmoeidēs, from sigma (see sigma)

means.word_mean: 1. curved in two directions (like the letter S)
2. of or relating to the sigmoid flexure in the large intestine
